.. |title| replace:: Articles

|title|
=======
.. djangoadmin:class:: books.Article Article

Fields
------


.. djangoadmin:attribute:: books.Article.id ID

	Integer

.. djangoadmin:attribute:: books.Article.headline Article headline

	Headline will be shown in listing page
	
	String (up to 100)

.. djangoadmin:attribute:: books.Article.publications In publications

	Hold down "Control", or "Command" on a Mac, to select more than one.
	
	:djangoadmin:class:`books.Publication`
